title: What are the difference between Twitter and Sina Weibo? - Quora

response.answer_text: Weibo has so much more features than Twitter does. Twitter’s interface is less media-rich than Weibo’s: Weibo is more similar to Facebook than it is to Twitter because it provides animated emoticons, videos, and music.There are threaded comments on Weibo social media, not on Twitter: getting feedback for a product/service can help the business improve their strategyUsers can benefit from Micro Topics on Weibo, but not on Twitter: this function identifies all tweets from a certain topic, then store them on created page for all users to find and discuss the topic.Trend categorization: The Board of Fame is a page for hottest trends on the platform.More details can be found here Chinese Social Media: Weibo and Twitter comparison (4 Key Differences)
Sina weibo is now more like Facebook, with all kinds of functionalities that few people actually know about. Twitter, in comparison, has stagnated.
